alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 4:35PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY... SOUTHEASTERN WALLER AND NORTHWESTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 435 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cypress, or 11 miles southwest of Tomball, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Humble, Katy, Tomball, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Pinehurst, Spring Branch North, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Aldine, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Valley, The Woodlands, northwestern Northside / Northline, Mission Bend, and Kingwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
